loans.name: Otoniel De Los Reyes

texts.es: Otoniel es un hombre emprendedor de 35 años de edad, acompañado, con dos hijos, su negocio es una pulpería en su domicilio desde hace 20 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de inventario de granos básicos como quintal de arroz, azúcar, bidon de aceite, cajas de jabones, cajillas de gaseosas, golosinas, pollo, productos lácteos, etc.
texts.en: Otoniel is an enterprising man. He is 35 years old, lives with his partner, and has two children. He has run a small grocery store out of his home for twenty years. The loan that he is requesting will be used to buy inventory for his store, such as rice, sugar, oil, soaps, cases of sodas, candies, chicken, dairy products, and more.

loans.use: stock the small grocery he runs out of his home.

loans.name: Griselda Beatriz

texts.es: Griselda es una mujer emprendedora microempresaria, casada, con tres hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de perecederos en el mercado  mayoreo de Managua desde hace 5 años, tiene a dos personas que le ayudan a vender. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de  pipián, ayote,  limón criollo, limón sin semilla, yuca rameña, manzanito, chilote, tomate.
texts.en: Griselda is an enterprising small business owner. She is married and has three children in her care. For the last five years, she has sold perishable foods in the wholesale market in Managua. She has two people who help her with her sales. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy a wide variety of fruits and vegetables, including pipián and ayote (pumpkin-like squashes), two types of lime, yuca (a starchy tuber), baby apples, baby corn, and tomatoes.

loans.use: stock her fruit and vegetable market stall

loans.name: Los Jirones Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo forman tres socias trabajadoras una de ellas es Casimira tiene la edad de 28 años, acompañada, con cuatros hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es la agricultura y la venta de frutas desde hace 10 años. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de naranja, melón, sandía, plátanos por cien. Ella tiene de ser cliente de la institución 9 meses. María mujer de 28 años su negocio es una pulpería y Maribel mujer de 37 años se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos en pie.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of three hard-working members, one of whom is Casimira, 28. She is in a common-law marriage and has four children who she cares for. She has had a business in farming and selling fruits for 10 years.

She is requesting this loan to buy oranges, melons, watermelons, and bananas by the hundreds. She has been a member of this institution for nine months. Maria, 28, has a small grocery store and Maribel, 37, makes a living by raising and selling live pigs.

loans.use: to buy oranges, melons, watermelons, and bananas by the hundreds.

loans.name: Estoy Confiando Group

texts.es: Silvia es una de las tres integrantes del grupo estoy confiando ella tiene la edad de 35 años, casada, con dos hijos, su negocio es la venta de ropa ambulante en su comunidad y alrededores desde hace 3 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 1 ½ años. El crédito lo está solicitando nuevamente para la compra de faldas, trajes para niños, licras, blusas, camisas, pantalones. Zelenia tiene 27 años su negocio es la venta de nacatamales,cabeza de chancho, Victoria mujer de 54 años se dedica a la venta de sopa.
texts.en:
Silvia, 35, is one of the three members of Estoy Confiando Group.  She's married and has two children.  Her business for three years has been selling clothing as a street vendor in her community and the surrounding area.  She has been a client of the institution for a year and a half.

Silvia's loan is again to buy skirts, children's outfits, stretch pants, blouses, shirts, and pants.

Zelenia, 27, sells nacatamales [Nicaraguan-style tamales] and "cabeza de chancho" [a pork dish].  Victoria, 54, sells soup.

loans.use: to buy clothing

loans.name: Reparto Andres Vega Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras y luchadoras una de ellas es María tiene la edad de 30 años, soltera, con cuatro hijos, su negocio es la venta de comida desde hace 3 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 2 años.Tiempo que ha demostrado puntualidad en sus cuotas. Está solicitando nuevamente crédito para la compra de arroz, aceite, tortillas, carne, harina, repollo, tomate, chiltoma, cebolla, queso, plátanos, cremas, bolsas. Maritza tiene 28 años su negocio es la venta de calzado, Seneyda tiene 33 años se dedica a la elaboración y venta de tortillas.
texts.en:
María is one member in a group made up of three enterprising and hardworking partners.  She is thirty years old and single, with four children.  For three years her business has been selling food.  She has been a client of the bank for two years.  In that time she has been punctual in her payments.  She is asking again for a loan to buy rice, oil, tortillas, meat, flour, cabbages, tomatoes, sweet peppers, onions, cheese, bananas, cream, and bags. 

Maritza is 28 years old.  Her business is shoe sales.

Seneyda is 33 years old.  She works making and selling tortillas.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil, tortillas, meat, flour, cabbages, tomatoes, sweet peppers, onions, cheese, bananas, cream, and bags.

loans.name: Rios De Babilonia Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman tres socios muy trabajadores uno de ellos es María de los Santos tiene la edad de 30 años, casada, su negocio es la compra y venta de cosechas, las distribuye a personas hondureñas desde hace 1 año. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de cosechas de tamarindo. Aura tiene la edad de 34 años su negocio es la elaboración de delantales, Víctor tiene 19 años su negocio es la venta de perecederos
texts.en:
This group is comprised of three very hard-working members. One of these members is Maria de los Santos. She is 30 years old, married, and has a business in buying and selling crops. She has been distributing these to Hondurans for one year.

She is requesting this loan to buy tamarindo crops. Aura, 34, has a business in making smocks and Victor, 19, has a business in selling perishable items.

loans.use: to buy tamarindo crops.

loans.name: Yeison Camilo

texts.es:
El es yeison Camilo  tiene 20 años, es de la cuidad de Bogotá, es el tercero de los hermanos, cuando empezó a crecer se dio cuenta de lo difícil que era la situación económica de la mama, el hermano mellizo y el hermano mayor  quien ya falleció. 
La mama tenía 40 años cuando él nació, el nombre era Graciela, quien también ya falleció, la mama trabajo en una empresa de flores de donde salió enferma, luego de trabajar muchos años en ella, debido a los químicos que manejaban en esa empresa  le dio una enfermedad que no tenia cura, él empezó a enfrentarse a una realidad de  preocupación y angustia por que el ver sufrir a la madre le impactaba mucho, y las diferencias  que ella vivía con el padre que nunca  ha vivido con ellos y  nunca le importó la vida de ellos.
Cuando él tenía 8 años, al hermano mayor falleció, para la mamá fue muy difícil enfrentarse a esta situación, después de esto ella lloraba todos los días, pero a pesar de todo ella fue muy fuerte y a los dos hijos mellizos los saco adelante en la primaria y el bachillerato antes de fallecer. 
Ellos han vivido la mayoría del tiempo en arriendo, para la mama le era muy difícil pagar el arriendo y el sustento de ellos, ella era una persona muy responsable con el pago de los recibos y hacia que le rindiera los pocos ingresos que tenia para sacarlos adelante a él y el  hermano.
La madre a ellos los  formó en valores y les decía que no se dejaran  influenciar por las malas amistades, que siempre había un límite y que ellos debían plantear parámetros. 
Gracias a los esfuerzos de la madre y con la mano de dios ellos terminaron el bachillerato, pues a pesar de las dificultades económicas de  la madre siempre  les enseño que la única forma de lograr una vida digna y buena era a través de la educación, que si no estudiaban les tocaría pasar muchas dificultades así como a ella le sucedió.
La madre falleció en el año 2010 y para el hermano mellizo y para él ha sido muy difícil superar la muerte de la única persona que los apoyaba emocionalmente y económicamente. 
Hace seis meses empezaron a estudiar en campo alto y  han tenido una sumatoria de valores agregados que se les han implantado allí, para ellos ha sido de gran ayuda estudiar en campo alto, han tenido un acercamiento en conocimientos los cuales los están motivando a tener metas que cumplir y culminar los estudios  con  entusiasmo y disciplina.
Se les ha dificultado en cuestión económica  el pago mensual de los estudios por eso ellos agradecen la colaboración de kiva para tener la posibilidad de un subsidio en la matricula.
texts.en:
Yeison Camilo is 20 and lives in the city of Bogotá.  He is one of three children and as he was growing up he realized how difficult the economic situation was for his mother, his twin brother and his eldest brother, who passed away.

His mother was 40 when he was born.  Her name was Graciela and she also passed away.  She used to work for a flower company but became ill after working there a long time.  The chemicals she handled in the company were blamed for her illness which had no cure.  Yeison Camilo had to face reality and became worried and anxious on seeing how much his mother suffered.  She also had a bad relationship with his father who never lived with them and never cared for them.

When he was eight years old, his eldest brother died.  It was difficult for his mother to face this situation and she would weep every day.  But she was very strong and able to provide for her twin boys, getting them through grade school and high school before she died.

Most of their lives, they lived in rental property and it was hard for his mother to pay the rent and support the children.  She was very responsible and paid the bills and stretched her income to support the two boys.  She gave them values and told them never to let bad friendships influence them.  There was a limit and they had to establish the parameters.

Thanks to his mother's efforts and God's help, they were able to finish high school.  Despite the economic difficulties, their mother always taught them how to lead a decent life through education, which she believed would make life easier.  

Yeison Camilo's mother passed away in 2010, and it has been very difficult for him and his twin brother to overcome the death of the only person who supported them both emotionally and economically.

Six months ago they began their university studies which has given them even more values.  The access to knowledge motivates them to go on to finish a career with enthusiasm and discipline.

The monthly payment of school tuition has become difficult though, so they are grateful to Kiva for a loan to pay for tuition.

loans.use: To pay for a semester of tuition.

loans.name: William

texts.en:
William is a repeat borrower aged 55. He is a married man with seven children. He applied for a loan of UGX 600,000 to help him improve his farming business.  

He has a challenge of low business turnover from the farming and low levels of purchases in the market, so he decided to come to UGAFODE for a loan to increase manpower so he can expand both his farm land and crops. This will increase his productivity and his livelihood in the long run.

loans.use: To hire labourers.

loans.name: Wilson

texts.en:
Wilson wants to express his appreciation to the Kiva lenders for the good job they are doing. 

He is married and a bit elderly though he wants to keep active. This he does by grazing cows since he has enough farm land. He is however limited by capital resources. For this reason he is looking to Ugafode for a loan to help him purchase young bulls at a low price so he can fatten them and later sell them. He is hard working and honest.

loans.use: To buy baby bulls.

loans.name: Lluvia De Amor Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cuatro socias luchadoras una de ellas es Ninoska tiene la edad de 28 años, acompañda, con dos hijos, su negocio es la venta de artesanía, plantas de rosas, caramelos desde hace 9 años, sus productos los comercializa en los diferentes departamentos como Boaco, Granada. Tiene 5 años de ser cliente de la institución, El crédito lo solicita para la compra de artesanía de luna, sol, jarrones, plantas de rosa, churros, trocantes, caramelos rayados, leche de burra. Waleska tiene 25 años se dedica a la venta de artesanía, plantas y caramelos, Xiomara mujer de 45 años su negocio es la venta de artesanía, plantas, caramelos, Luisa mujer de 56 años se dedica a la venta de artesanía.
texts.en:
This group is formed of four hard-working members. One of whom is Ninoska, age 28. She has a partner and two children, and her line of work for the last nine years is selling crafts, rose plants, and caramels. She sells her products in various departments such as Boaco, Granada. She is in her fifth year as a member of the institution. The loan that she is requesting will be used to buy moon and sun crafts, vases, roses, churros, sweets, and donkey milk. 

Waleska has 25 years experience in the business of selling crafts, plants, and candies.
Xiomara, 45 years old, sells crafts, plants, and candies.
Luisa, 56 years old, sells handicrafts.

loans.use: buy crafts, rose plants, and candies for resale.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is married with seven children and all her children go to school. She has no additional family members. She operates a pub in the market. She has been in this business for some years. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested a loan of UGX 900,000 from MCDT – SACCO to buy crates of beer, soda, local gin and spirits. She generates additional income from a food stall. Her major challenges are electricity and the fluctuating prices of drinks. Her goals and aspirations are to own a fully stocked pub and also to educate her children up to university level. 

She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and doesn’t have access to piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees, food, and rent for the bar.

loans.use: To buy more crates of beer, soda, local gin and spirits.

loans.name: Robinah

texts.en:
Robinah is single with five children; three of her children go to school. She has no additional family members. She operates a restaurant in the market. She has been in this business for the last five years. She operates her business on a retail basis. She works seven days a week. 

She has requested a loan of UGX 700,000 from MCDT – SACCO to buy bunches of green bananas, rice, sugar, beef, flour and cooking oil. Her major challenges are seasonality and defaulters. Her goals and aspirations are to own a fully stocked restaurant and to educate her children to university level. She lives in her own house and the family has access to electricity and does not have piped water. Her monthly expenses include school fees and food.

loans.use: To buy more bunches of green bananas, rice, sugar, beef, flour and cooking oil.

loans.name: Farida

texts.en:
Farida is single with six children, five of her children go to school. She has no additional family members. She operates a boutique at the market. She sells her products on a retail basis. She has been in this business for the last five years. She works six days a week. 

She has requested a loan of 700,000 UGX from MCDT – SACCO to buy a bale of first class and second class clothes. Her major challenges are transportation and seasonality. Her goals and aspirations are to own a fully stocked boutique and to educate her children up to university level. She lives in her own house and the family has access to piped water and electricity. Her monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

loans.use: To buy a bale of used and new clothes.

loans.name: Ramalila Group

texts.es: Grupo conformado por tres socias emprendedoras de éxitos una de ellas es María Eugenia tiene la edad de 35 años, acompañada, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos por catálogo de Avon y zafiro desde hace 3 años, los distribuye en su comunidad y alrededores. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de prendas de acero de la marca zafiro como es anillos, pulseras, cadenas, chapas, productos de Avon como perfumes, cremas, maquillaje, pinturas, otros. Melba tiene 45 años su negocio es la venta de pollo y productos de Avon, Juliana tiene 48 años su negocio es la venta de perecederos.
texts.en:
This group consists of three successful entrepreneurial members. One of them is Maria Eugenia. She is 35 years old and is married. For three years, her business has been selling cosmetics through the Avon catalog and Zafiro products. She makes her sales in her community and its surroundings. She needs the loan to buy Zafiro brand steel articles, such as rings, bracelets, chains, and pendants, and Avon products, such as perfumes, creams, makeup, lipstick, and other items. 

Melba is 45, and her business is selling chicken and Avon products. Juliana is 48; her business is selling perishable products.

loans.use: to stock her business with Zafiro brand steel articles, such as rings, bracelets, chains, and pendants, and Avon products such as perfumes, creams, makeup, lipstick, and other items

loans.name: Los Sequeira Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cinco socios luchadores y trabajadores uno de ellos es María mujer de 46 años de edad, acompañada, su negocio es una pulpería desde hace 10 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 9 meses. Está solicitando nuevamente crédito para  la compra de quintal de arroz, paquetes de candela,bolsones de papel, toallas, café, cigarro, crema perfecta, cajas de jabón, azúcar, cloro, detergente, marucha, etc. José hombre de 52 años su negocio es una pulpería, María Isabel tiene 41 años se dedica a la compra y venta de cosechas, José Luis tiene 33 años su negocio es la venta de tamales, Lisbeth tiene 28 años su negocio es la compra y venta de cosechas.
texts.en: This group is composed of five hardworking and persistent partners. One of them is Maria, 46, who is in a relationship. She has had her grocery store for 10 years and has been a client of this institution of 9 months. She is applying for a loan to buy a sack of rice, candles, tote bags, paper towels, coffee, cigars, Perfecta brand body creams, boxes of soap, sugar, bleach, detergent, ramen noodles, and others. Jose, a man of 52 years, has a grocery store business. Maria Isabel is 41 and makes her living in the purchase and sale of crops. Jose Luis is 33 and his business is selling tamales. Lisbeth is 28 and her business is buying and selling crops.

loans.use: to purchase stock for her grocery store including rice, candles, and coffee.

loans.name: Jeslin Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres mujeres de negocio una de ellas es Blanca tiene la edad de 47 años de edad, con dos hijos, viuda, su negocio  es la venta de granos básicos y verduras desde hace 5 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 6 años. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, maíz, detergente, saco de yuca, chayote, zanahoria, plátanos, quequisque. Lilian tiene la edad de 28 años su negocio es la venta de ropa interior, Nancy tiene 22 años su negocio es una pulpería y venta de cosméticos.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three women, one of whom is Blanca, 47.  She's a widow and has two children.  Her business for five years has been selling basic grains and vegetables.  She has been a client of the institution for six years.

Blanca's requesting the loan to buy rice, sugar, beans, oil, corn, detergent, a bag of yuca, chayote, carrots, bananas, and quequisque [a local tuber].

Lilian, 28, sells underwear and Nancy, 22, has a grocery store and sells cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy supplies

loans.name: El Capulin 1 Group

texts.es: Grupo conformado por cuatro socios emprendedores y luchadores uno de ellos es Winston tiene la edad de 33 años, soltero, con un hijo, su negocio es la compra y venta de cosechas. Los productos los comercializa en el mercado de Masaya desde hace  1 ½ año. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de cosecha de tamarindo y mango. Lucila tiene 33 años su negocio es vender repuesto de bicicletas, Juan  tiene 40 años y Pedro tiene 56 años ambos se dedican al negocio de la compra y venta de cosechas.
texts.en:
One member of a group formed by four enterprising members and fighters is Winston. He is 33, single with one son and he buys and sells crops. He has been selling his products in the Masaya market for the last year and a half.

The loan is needed to buy tamarind and mango crops. 

Lucila, 33, sells bicycle parts, Juan, 40, and Pedro 56, both purchase and sell crops.

loans.use: to buy tamarind and mango crops.

loans.name: Silueta De Cristal Group

texts.es: Ivania es una de las integrantes del grupo silueta de cristal tiene la edad de 38 años, casada, con tres hijos, su negocio es un taller de zapatería desde hace 8 años, actualmente hay 8 trabajadores que elaboran el calzado.Sus productos los comercializa en Rivas, León y Managua. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 7 años. Está solicitando nuevamente crédito para la compra de materiales como charol, azulón, pega amarilla, pega blanca, plantillas, esponja, suela, mano de obra. Ivania del Socorro se dedica a la venta de legumbres,verduras y pozol, Juan tiene 27 su negocio es un taller de zapatería.
texts.en:
Ivania, 38, is one of the members of Silueta de Cristal Group.  She's married and has three children.

Ivania has been a shoemaker for eight years.  Currently she has eight workers who make the shoes, which she sells in Rivas, León, and Managua.  She has been a client of the institution for seven years.

Ivania's again requesting a loan to buy materials such as patent leather, felt, glue, insoles, sponges, and soles, and to pay for labor.

Ivania del Socorro makes a living selling legumes, vegetables, and pozol [a corn beverage].  Juan, 27, is a cobbler.

loans.use: to buy shoemaking supplies

loans.name: Virgen Milagrosa Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo forman tres mujeres trabajadoras una de ellas es Maritza tiene la edad de 33 años, acompañada, su negocio es una pulpería en su domicilio desde 5 años. Está solicitando crédito para la inversión de granos básicos como arroz, azúcar, marucha, gaseosa, Pepsi, café, café presto, tang, aceite, chiverías, papel higiénico, gaseosas. Damaris tiene 25 años  y Jenny de 24 años se dedica a la venta de comida y fresco.
texts.en: This group is comprised of three hard-working women, one of whom is Maritza, 33. She is in a common-law marriage and has had a grocery store business in her home for 5 years. She is requesting a loan to buy basic grains such as rice, sugar, chuck beef, drinks, Pepsi, coffee, instant coffee, tang, cooking oil, dairy products, and toilet paper. Damaris, 25, and Jenny, 24, make a living selling food and cold drinks.

loans.use: to buy basic grains such as rice, sugar, chuck beef, drinks, Pepsi, coffee, instant coffee, tang, cooking oil, dairy products, and toilet paper.

loans.name: Los Meneses Group

texts.es: Este lo forman tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Migdalia mujer de 45 años, casada, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 9 años. Tiene 1 ½ año de ser cliente de la institución. Solicita un crédito para la compra de granos básicos como gaseosas, big cola, Pepsi, arroz, aceite, azúcar, papel higiénico, pastillas, jabón, café, tang, shampoo, cloro, ace, fósforos, chiverías, jabón de lavar trastes, otros. Julia de 52 años se dedica a la venta de tortillas, helados y refrescos, Ileana tiene 40 años su negocio es la venta de refrescos y crianza de cerdo en pie.
texts.en:
These 3 members came together, one of whom is Migdalia, a 45-year-old married woman. She has operated a general store in her home for 9 years and has been a client of our institution for the last 1 ½ years.

Migdalia is requesting a loan to purchase basic grains, Big Cola, Pepsi, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, pills, soap, coffee, Tang, shampoo, Clorox, ace bandages, matches, household cleansers, and other inventory items. 

Julia, 52-years-old, sells tortillas, ice cream, and soft drinks. Ileana is 40 years old and her business is selling soft drinks and raising pigs.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, Big Cola, Pepsi, rice, oil, sugar, toilet paper, pills, soap, coffee, Tang, shampoo, Clorox, ace bandages, matches, household cleansers, etc.

loans.name: Jireth Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socios emprendedores uno de ellos es José tiene la edad 49 años, casado, su negocio es la venta de electrodoméstico en Granada en su alrededores desde hace 25 años. El crédito lo solicita para compra de televisor, cama matrimonial indufom, refrigeradora, plancha oster, microondas, abanico. Verónica mujer de 49 años su negocio es una pulpería, María mujer de 35 años su negocio es un taller de zapatería.
texts.en:
The group is made up of three enterprising members, one of whom is José, 49.  He's married and has sold appliances in and around Granada for 25 years.

José's requesting the loan to buy a television set, an Indufoam double bed, a refrigerator, an Oster iron, a microwave oven, and a fan.

Verónica, 49, has a grocery store and María, 35, is a shoemaker.

loans.use: to buy appliances

loans.name: Divino Rostro Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo forman cuatro socias emprendedoras y luchadoras una de ellas es Juana mujer de 60 años, soltera, con un hijo bajo su cargo, su negocio es una pulpería en su domicilio   desde hace 5 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 4 años. Su crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de inventario de granos básicos como quintal de arroz, azúcar, bidón de aceite, cajas de sopa magi, jabón extra, crema la perfecta, avena, cajillas de gaseosa. María mujer de 55 años su negocio es la venta de derivados del maíz como pinol, pinolillo, cajetas, rosquillas, semilla de jícaro, Nora tiene 35 años se dedica a la venta de gas butano petrogas, Irene tiene 34 años su negocio es la venta de cereales y dulcería en Managua y Masaya.
texts.en: This group is made up of four enterprising and hardworking ladies.  Juana is 60 years old, single, and has a son under her care.  She has had a general store in her home for five years and has been with the institution for four years.  She is asking for this loan to buy basic grains such as rice, sugar, cooking oil, boxes of instance soup, cream, oatmeal, and cases of soft drinks.  Maria is 55 years old and sells corn products such as pinol, pinolillo, cakes, donuts, and gourd seed.  Norma is 35 years old and sells butane gas.  Irene is 34 years old and sells cereals and sweets in Managua and Masaya.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Fuerza En Cristo Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socios luchadores y trabajadores uno de ellos es juan tiene la edad de 29 años, acompañado, con dos hijos bajo su responsabilidad, su negocio es la venta de pan en el mercado municipal de Masaya desde hace 8 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 5 años. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de inventario de pan como barra simple, tortuga, trenza, tostaditas, pico. María tiene 51 años su negocio es la venta de productos  químicos, Mercedes mujer de 49 años  su negocio es la venta de comida.
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking members. Juan is one of them and is 29 years old, married, and has a son under his care.  He has been selling bread in the local Masaya market for 8 years and has been a client of the institution for 5 years.  He will use the money from this loan to buy bread such as, loaves, turtle, braids, tostaditas, and pico.  Maria is 51 years old and sells chemical products.  Mercedes is 49 years old and sells food.

loans.use: to buy bread.

loans.name: Colirios Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo forman tres socias trabajadoras y luchadoras una de ellas es Nohemí tiene 28 años, casada, con un hijo bajo su responsabilidad, su negocio es la venta de repostería desde hace un año, tiempo en cual lleva siendo cliente de la institución también demostrando responsabilidad en sus pagos. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de picos y empanadas al por mayor. Patricia tiene la edad de 39 años su negocio es la venta de piñatas, Sonia tiene 27 años se dedica a la venta de cosméticos y repostería.
texts.en: This group is formed by three hardworking partners. One of them is Nohemi, who is 28 years old, married, and has a son under her care. Her one year old business is the sale of pastries. In that time she has been a client of this institution showing responsibility in her payments. The loan is requested to buy "picos" (sweet pastry goods) and "empanadas" (turnovers) at wholesale prices. Patricia is 39 years old and has a business in which she sells piñatas. Sonia is 27 years old and has a business in which she sells cosmetic items and pastries.

loans.use: To buy "picos" (sweet pastry goods) and "empanadas" (turnovers) at wholesale prices.

loans.name: Olinto Valle Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres mujeres luchadoras una de ellas es Juana mujer de 53 años, casada, con dos hijos, su negocio es la compra y venta de prendas laminadas en oro y plata desde hace 12 años, ella comercializa sus prendas den su comunidad y alrededores. Lleva 4 años siendo cliente de la institución lo cual ha demostrado ser una persona muy responsable en sus cuotas. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de prendas como anillos, cadenas, pulseras, cadenas, aretes. Lilian mujer de 45 años su negocio es la venta de prendas y cosméticos, Reyna mujer de 37 años se dedica a la venta de ropa.
texts.en:
This group of three warrior women includes Juana, a woman of 53, married, with two children. For the past 12 years, her business has been the buying and selling of gold- and silver-plated jewelry. She sells her pieces in her community and the surrounding areas. She has been a client of the institution for four years, which has shown her to be a person who is very responsible with her payments. 

She needs the loan to buy pieces such as rings, chains, bracelets, and earrings. 

Lillian is a woman of 45 who sells jewelry and cosmetics. Reyna, a woman of 37, sells clothing.

loans.use: to buy items such as rings, chains, bracelets, and earrings.

loans.name: Rosada Group

texts.es: Lucrecia es una de las tres integrantes del grupo rosada casada, con un hijo bajo su responsabilidad, su negocio es la venta de artesanía en un tramo del mercado local de Masaya, lleva 20 años dedicándose a ese negocio  y tiene de ser cliente de la institución 3 años, el crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de maxis, cotonas, camisetas nacionales, blusas típicas, vestidos de niñas, cuadros. Rosa mujer de 31 años se dedica a la venta de huevo ambulante y María Antonia tiene 46 años, se dedica a la venta de frijoles cocidos, gaseosas, leña.
texts.en:
Lucrecia is one of the three members of the group "Rosada Casada" with one child in her care. Her business is craft sales in a section of the local market in Masaya. She has dedicated 20 years to her business, and has been a client of the institution for 3 years. She is asking for this loan to buy maxis, cotton, national shirts, typical blouses, girls' dresses, and pictures.  

Rosa is 31 years old and sells eggs as a street vendor. 

María Antonia is 46 years old and sells cooked beans, soda, and charcoal.

loans.use: to buy maxis, cotton, national shirts, typical blouses, girls' dresses, and pictures.

loans.name: Maria Auxiliadora Group

texts.es: Mario es uno de los cuatro integrantes del grupo María auxiliadora tiene la edad de 41 años, casado, con tres hijos, su negocio es la venta de granos básicos desde hace 3 años, comercializa sus productos en Granada y Masaya. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución  5 años, el crédito lo requiere para la compra de  quintal de frijoles y quintal de maíz, Lesbia tiene la edad de 44 años su negocio es la venta de nacatamales, Alexander tiene la edad de 27 años su negocio es la venta de granos básicos, María mujer de 43 años se dedica a la venta de frutas.
texts.en:
Mario is one of the four members of the María Auxiliadora group. He is 41 years old, married, and has three children. For three years he has had a business selling staple foods; he sells his products in Granada and Masaya. He has been a client of the institution for five years. He needs the loan to buy a quintal [46 kg] of beans and a quintal of corn.

Lesbia is 44 years old and her business is selling nacatamales [traditional Nicaraguan banana-leaf-wrapped tamales]. Alexander is 27 years old and his business is selling staple foods. María, a 43-year-old woman, sells fruit.

loans.use: to buy a quintal [46 kg] of beans and a quintal of corn

loans.name: Nueva Esperanza Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo forman cinco integrantes trabajadores y luchadores una de ellos es Juan Benito tiene la edad de 31 años, casado, con tres hijos bajo su responsabilidad, su negocio es la venta de ropa y electrodomésticos ambulante en su comunidad y alrededores. Tiene de dedicarse a este negocio 7 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de pantalones para hombre, pantalones para mujer, camisas, blusas, DVD, TV 21, plancha. Martha tiene la edad de 31 años se dedica a la venta de comida y gaseosas, Luz tiene la edad de 62 años su negocio es una pulpería, Jimy tiene la edad de 32 años se dedica a hacer recorridos a lugares turísticos a la personas extranjeras, Juan José tiene 32 años su negocio es la reparación y mantenimiento de teléfonos celulares.
texts.en:
This group is made up of five plucky and hard-working members, one of whom is 31-year-old Juan Benito. Juan is married and has three children. He has a business selling clothes and electrical appliances as a street vendor in his community and the surrounding areas. He has been doing this for seven years.

Juan is applying for a this loan in order to buy men's and women's trousers, shirts, blouses, DVDs, a television and an iron.

Marth is 31 years old and has a business selling meals and fizzy drinks. Luz is 62 years old and has grocery store. Thirty-two-year-old Jimy works as a guide, taking foreign tourists out to tourist sites. Juan José is 32 years old and has a business repairing and maintaining mobile phones.

loans.use: to buy men's and women's trousers, shirts, blouses, DVDs, a television and an iron.

loans.name: Las Mandarinas Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman cinco socios emprendedores y luchadores uno de ellos es Damaris tiene la edad de 25 años, acompañada, con un hijo bajo su responsabilidad, su negocio es la venta de frutas desde hace 10 años. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de naranja mandarina, melón, papaya, piña, limones. Verónica mujer de 41 años se dedica a la venta de perecederos, Juana mujer de 62 años su negocio es comerciante de frutas y verduras, María tiene la edad de 65 años su negocio es la venta de perecederos, Rómulo tiene la edad de 49 años su negocio es la venta de frutas.
texts.en:
This group is composed of five enterprising and fighting members. One of them, Damaris is 25 years old. She is married and has one child she is responsible for. She has been selling fruit for 10 years. She needs the loan to buy mandarin oranges, melon, papaya, pineapple and limes.

Verónica is 41 years old and she works selling perishables. Juana is 62 years old and her business is selling fruit and vegetables. María is 65 and her business is selling perishables. Rómulo is 49 years old and he sells fruit.

loans.use: to buy mandarins, melon, papaya, pineapple and limes.

loans.name: Alonso Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman tres socios exitosos de negocio uno de ellos es Yovania, acompañada, su negocio es la venta de prendas y cosméticos desde hace 5 años. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de perfumes de varón, perfumes de mujer, cremas faciales, cremas corporales, cremas de manos, anillos, cadenas, aretes, pulseras, relojes. Alonso tiene la edad de 38 años su negocio es la venta de carne, Blanca  tiene la edad de 27 años su negocio es la venta frutas
texts.en: The group is formed of three business-minded members, one of whom is Yovania. Yovania lives with her partner and for five years has worked selling clothing and cosmetics. She needs a loan to buy men's and women's perfumes, facial creams, body creams, hand creams, rings, chains, earrings, bracelets and watches. Alonso is 38 and sells meat; Blanca is 27 and sells fruit.

loans.use: to buy men's and women's perfumes, facial creams, body creams, hand creams, rings, chains, earrings, bracelets and watches

loans.name: Esfuerzo De Mujer Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias emprendedoras de éxitos una de ellas es Shirley tiene la edad de 24 años, acompañada, con un hijo bajo su responsabilidad, su negocio es la venta de ropa y cerámica desde hace 5 años. Solicita un crédito para la compra de mercadería de ropa como pantalones, camisas, blusas, shores, chinelas, brasieres, corpiño, juego de jarrones. Ana tiene la edad de 36 años su negocio es la venta de leña, Johana mujer de 33 años su negocio  es la venta de frutas y verduras.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three successful entrepreneurs. One of them is Shirley. She is 24 years old married with one child under her care. She has been selling clothing and ceramics for 5 years. She is requesting a loan to buy merchandise like  pants, shirts, blouses, shorts, slippers, bras, bodices and vase sets.

Ana is 36 and she sells wood. Johana is 33 years old and she sells fruit and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy clothing like pants, shirts, blouses, shorts, slippers, bras, bodices and vase sets.

loans.name: Los Claveles De San Blas Group

texts.es: Cuatros mujeres emprendedoras  de éxitos son las que forman el grupo una de ellas es María tiene la edad de 46 años, casada, su negocio es la compra y venta de cosechas de jocote y pipián. Sus productos los comercializa en el mercado oriental. El crédito lo requiere  para la compra de cosechas de jocote y pipián. Blanca tiene 21 años su negocio es la compra y venta de cosechas, Meragna mujer de 31 años su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras aparte todos los fines de semana hace fritanga, Elizabeth tiene 18 años su negocio es la venta de pollo.
texts.en:
The group is comprised of four hard working and successful women, one of which is María.  María is 46 years old, married, and has a business buying and selling jocotes (a fruit) and pipián (a type of squash).  She sells her products in the oriental market.  She will use the loan to purchase jocotes and pipián.

Blanca is 21 years old, and has a business buying and selling crops.  Meragna is 31 years old and has a business selling fruits and vegetables, and every weekend, she makes fried foods.  Elizabeth is 18 years old and has a business selling chicken.

loans.use: purchase jocotes and pipián

loans.name: El Gavilan Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socios trabajadores uno de ellos es Martha tiene la edad de 23 años, casada, con un hijo menor, su negocio es la venta de frutas en el mercado de Oriental desde hace 7 años. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de frutas de naranja, mandarina, limón, zapote, zanahoria, papa. Miguel tiene la edad de 29 años y Estebana de 37 años su negocio es la venta de frutas.
texts.en: The group comprises three hardworking members, one of whom is Martha. She's 23 and married with a young son. For seven years she has worked selling fruit in the Oriental market. She is asking for a loan to buy fruits such as oranges, mandarins, lemons, sapotas, carrots and potatoes. Miguel is 29 and Estebana is 37 and they also sell fruit.

loans.use: to buy fruits such as oranges, mandarins, lemons, sapotas, carrots and potatoes

loans.name: Lagrimas De Cristal Group

texts.es: Tres son las socias microempresarios  que conforman el grupo una de ellas es Katherine tiene la edad de 20 años casada, su negocio es la venta de platanitos y fritos desde hace 2 años. Solicita crédito para la compra de canastos de plátanos, aceite, bolsas, leña, repollo, zanahoria, vinagre y papel. Xiomara tiene 23 años su negocio es la venta de ropa usada de niño, Irma tiene 47 años su negocio es la venta de tortillas y pinol.
texts.en:
The group is made up of three small business women, one of whom is Katherine.  Katherine is 20 years old and married.  For the past two years, she has had a business selling plantain chips and other fried snacks.  She is seeking a loan to purchase baskets of plantains, oil, bags, wood, cabbage, carrots, vinegar and paper.  

Xiomara is 23 years old and has a business selling used children's clothing.  Irma is 47 years old and has a business selling tortillas and pinol.

loans.use: purchase baskets of plantains, oil, bags, wood, cabbage, carrots, vinegar and paper.

loans.name: Laguna Azul Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socios emprendedores microempresarios uno de ellos es Ocadio  tiene la edad de 58 años, acompañado, con cinco hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es comercializar productos varios desde hace 20 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de sus productos como banano, chicharrón, cuajadas, atolillos, otros. Aura mujer de 49 años su negocio es la venta de productos varios, Marlon tiene 25 años su negocio es la venta de especie.
texts.en:
The group is comprised of three members who are hard working, small business entrepreneurs.  One of them is Ocadio.  He is 58 years old, married, and has five children.  For the past 20 years he has worked selling various products.  

He is seeking a loan to purchase items such as bananas, pork rinds, cheese curds, custard, and other products.

Aura is a 49 year old woman who also sells various products, and Marlon is 25 years old and works selling spices.

loans.use: purchase products such as: bananas, pork rinds, cheese curds, custard and other products.

loans.name: Cristo Rey Group

texts.es: Grupo conformado por tres socios luchadores y trabajadores uno de ellos es Ivania  tiene la edad de 40 años, casada, su negocio es la venta de granos básicos desde hace 4 años,  el crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de inventario como es 25 paquetes de nevax, 25 bidones de aceite, 65 cajas de jabones, 8 cajas de tollas saba, 3cajas de bujillas, 50 bolsas de sal, 13 bolsas de café toro, 35 bolsones de meneíto, 3 cajas de xedes, 2 cajas de azistin, 15 cajas de tang, 1 quintal de comida para pollos. Ana tiene 48 años su negocio es la venta de frutas, Pedro tiene 61 años su negocio es una pulpería.
texts.en:
The group is made up of three hardworking members, one of which is Ivania.  Ivania is 40 years old and is married.  For the past 4 years, she has run a business selling basic goods.  She is seeking this loan to purchase merchandise such as: 25 packages of Nevax, 25 barrels of oil, 65 boxes of soap, 8 boxes of paper towel, 3 boxes of spark plugs, 550 bags of salt, 13 bags of coffee, 35 sacks of cheese puffs, 3 boxes of Xedes, 2 boxes of all purpose cleaner, 15 boxes of Tang, 1 bushel of chicken feed.

Ana is 48 years old and has a business selling fruit.  Pedro is 61 years old and has a convenience store.

loans.use: purchase merchandise such as: 25 packages of Nevax, 25 barrels of oil, 65 boxes of soap, 8 boxes of paper towel, 3 boxes of spark plugs, 550 bags of salt, 13 bags of coffee, 35 sacks of cheese puffs, 3 boxes of Xedes, 2 boxes of all purpose cleaner, 15 boxes of Tang, 1 bushel of chicken feed.

loans.name: La Reforma Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman cuatro socios luchadores y trabajadores uno de ellos es Roger tiene 34 años de edad, casado, con tres hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de legumbres en el mercado Mayoreo de Managua  desde hace 7 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución 1 año, el crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de chiltoma, tomate, cebolla, zanahoria, calala, limón, yuca, quequisque, yerbabuena. Mariana mujer de 60 años su negocio es un taller de costura, Gilberto tiene la edad de 58 años su negocio es un taller de carpintería, Elena tiene 54 años su negocio es un taller de carpintería.
texts.en:
The group is made of four hard-working members. One member, Roger, is 34 years old, and is married with three children in his care. His business for 7 years has been the sale of legumes in Managua's wholesale market. He has been a client of the institution for one year. He is asking for this loan to purchase pepper, tomato, onion, carrot, passion fruit, lemon, yucca, taro root, and peppermint. 

Mariana is 60 years old, and she is a tailor. Gilberto is 58 years old, and he has a carpentry shop. Elena is 54 years old, and she also has a carpentry shop.

loans.use: to purchase pepper, tomato, onion, carrot, passion fruit, lemon, yucca, taro root, and peppermint.

loans.name: Mil Flores Group

texts.es: Grupo conformado por cuatro socios luchadores y emprendedores uno de ellos es Claudia tiene la edad de 50 años, casada, con un hijo bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de fritangas y almuerzos desde hace 12 años, lleva 5 años siendo cliente de la institución lo cual ha demostrado ser una cliente muy responsables en sus cuotas. El crédito lo solicita para la compra  de pollo, aceite, harina, plátanos, carbón, condimentos, repollo, vinagre, tomate, chiltoma, cebolla, carne de res, arroz, frijoles, queso, etc. Merali tiene 34 años de edad  su negocio es la venta de fritanga, Erick tiene 31 años se dedica a la venta de productos lácteos, Claudia tiene lA a edad de 45 años, su negocio es la venta de mueble y cerámica.
texts.en:
This group is made up of four hard-working and entrepreneurial members. Claudia is 50 years old, and is married with one child in her care. Her business for 12 yeras has been selling fried food and lunches. She has been a member of the institution for 5 years and has proven herself to be a very responsible client with her repayments. She is asking for this loan to purchase chicken, oil, flour, plantains, charcoal, spices, cabbage, vinegar, tomato, pepper, onion, beef, rice, beans, cheese, etc. 

Merali is 34 years old, and her business is selling xx. Erick is 31 years old and sells milk products. Claudia is 45 years old and she sells furniture and ceramics.

loans.use: to purchase chicken, oil, flour, plantains, charcoal, spices, cabbage, vinegar, tomato, pepper, onion, beef, rice, beans, cheese, etc.

loans.name: Delfin Azul Group

texts.es: Grupo conformado por tres socias emprendedoras microempresarias una de ellas es Heydi tiene la edad de 32 años, acompañada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de cuajadas y pescados desde hace 20 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de cuajadas y pescados para posteriormente venderlos. Adilia mujer de 31 años su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva, María mujer de 62 años su negocio es una pulpería y elaboración y venta de tortillas.
texts.en: The group is made up of three members who are enterprising small business owners. Heydi is 32 years old and is married with two children in her care. She has sold curds and fish for 20 years. She is asking for this loan to buy curds and fish to later sell. Adilia is 31 years old and her business is the sale of new clothing. Maria is 62 and she has a grocery store and makes and sells tortillas.

loans.use: to buy curds and fish to later sell.

loans.name: Marlong Jose

texts.es: Marlong es un hombre emprendedor de 32 años de edad, casado, con un hijo bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de ropa desde hace 3  años, su mercadería la comercializa en su comunidad y alrededores. El crédito lo está solicitando para la compra de toallas, ropa de cama, frutera, arrocera, abanico, gavetero.
texts.en: Marlong is an entrepreneurial 32 year-old man who is married with one child. He has sold clothing for 3 years. He sells his merchandise in his city and surrounding towns. He is asking for this loan to buy towels, bed linens, fruit dishes, rice, fans, and dressers.

loans.use: to buy towels, bed linens, fruit dishes, rice, fans, and dressers.

loans.name: Esperanza Guadalupe

texts.es: Esperanza es una mujer de 51 años, luchadora, artesana en la elaboración de cerámica en barro desde hace 12 años, casada, con tres hijos que dependen de ella. Tiene a tres personas que le ayudan en su negocio. Ha sido clienta de la institución durante 8 años. Solicita nuevamente crédito para  la compra de materia prima como barro, pintura, base, leña.
texts.en: Esperanza is a 51 year-old, hardworking craftswoman who has been making clay ceramics for 12 years. She is married with three children in her care. She has three people who help her in her store. She has been a client of the institution for 8 years, and is asking for a credit to buy primary materials like clay, paint, base, and wood.

loans.use: Esperanza is a 51 year-old, hardworking craftswoman who has been making clay ceramics for 12 years. She is married with three children in her care. She has three people who help her in her store. She has been a client of the institution for 8 years, and is asking for a credit to buy primary materials like clay, paint, base, and wood.

loans.name: Las Positivas Group

texts.es: Grupo conformado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Damaris tiene la edad de 27 años, casada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es hacer trabajos de estilismo a domicilio desde hace 5 años. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materiales como tintes, pinturas, tratamientos, ampollas, otros. Mayling mujer de 33 años su negocio es la venta de ropa usada, Coralia mujer de 44 años su negocio es la venta de arroz con leche, pasteles y pinol.
texts.en: This group is made up of three enterprising women, one of whom is 27-year-old Damaris. She is married and has two children in her care. Damaris has a business doing styling work from home - she has been doing this for five years. Damaris needs this loan in order to buy dyes, paints, treatments and other items. Mayling is 33 years old and has a business selling used clothing while 44-year-old Coralia has a business selling rice pudding, cakes and a drink made with roasted cornflour

loans.use: to buy supplies such as dyes, paints, treatments and more.

loans.name: Arman

texts.en:
Arman lives in Jrahovit village of Ararat region. He has been driving a taxi, using his own car, for 10 years. During these years of hard work Arman was able to sustain his family's living and get a stable income during the month. Now, as the car is old and needs to be repaired, Arman has asked for this loan.  

He has applied for a loan to be able to renovate his taxi; the car is seriously damaged and Arman isn't able to use it as a taxi at present. He has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.

The loan will be a huge support to Arman and he hopes for lenders' support.

loans.use: to renovate his taxi and buy new tires.

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en:
Vestine is 31 years old. She is married with two children. She sells food-stuffs and has been in the business for the past two years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more peanuts, beans, and sorghum to sell. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: To buy more peanuts, beans and sorghum to sell.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes is a married woman. She has four children. She describes herself as faithful. She operates a retail business where she sells fruits and vegetables. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a highly populated area and her primary customers are of all types. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of funds to buy stocks of groceries. 

She will use the KES 20,000 loan to add to her stock of fruits and vegetables. Her business goal is to have a retail shop within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will have a successful business. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to add to her stock of fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Speciose

texts.en:
Speciose is aged 45. She sells meat and tomatoes and has spent more than ten years in this business. 

She has requested the loan to buy more cooking oil, meat and tomatoes to sell. The profits from the business will be used to renovate the house.

loans.use: To buy more cooking oils, meat and tomatoes to sell.

loans.name: Francine

texts.en:
Francine is 49 years old. She is married with five children. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more timber and wood to sell. She plans to reinvest the profits in the same business.

loans.use: To buy more timber to sell.

loans.name: Familia Cristiana Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman tres socias microempresarias de éxitos una de ellas es Eremita tiene la edad de 73 años, soltera, con un hijo que depende de ella, su negocio es la venta de ropa desde hace 31 años, lleva siendo cliente de la institución 3 años. Está solicitando nuevamente crédito para la compra de materia prima para el negocio de la venta de comida como frijoles, arroz, condimentos, carne de res, carne de pollo, cebolla, chiltoma, tomate. Compra de pantalones de varón, pantalones de mujer, blusas. Fátima tiene 34 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos y ropa, María tiene 40 años su negocio es la venta de bisutería.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three members who are successful micro-entrepreneurs. 

One of them is Eremita, who is 73 years old and single, with a son who depends on her.  She has had a clothing sales business for 31 years, and she has been a client of the institution for 3 years. 

She is once again seeking a loan for the purchase of basic ingredients for her food sales business, such as beans, rice, seasonings, beef, chicken, onions, sweet peppers, and tomatoes, and for the purchase of men’s pants, women’s pants, and blouses.

Fátima has had a business selling cosmetics and clothing for 34 years, and María has been selling miscellaneous goods for 40 years.

loans.use: to purchase basic ingredients for her food sales business, such as beans, rice, seasonings, beef, chicken, onions, sweet peppers and tomatoes, and to purchase men's pants, women's pants, and blouses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish for resale.

loans.name: Cartas

texts.en:
Cartas is aged 45. She is married with two children. All of her children go to school. She sells clothes and has spent 13 years doing this. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more clothes for sale. With the profits from the business, she would like to buy a sewing machine which she hopes to use in the future.

loans.use: To buy more clothes for sale.

loans.name: Leontie

texts.en:
Leontie is 50 years old. She sells various foodstuffs and has been in the business for the past fifteen years. 

With the loan, she wants to buy more carrots, eggplants, and potatoes. The profits from the business will be used to renovate the house.

loans.use: To buy more carrots, eggplants and potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more milk, sugar, Ovaltine and drinks for resale.

loans.name: Rauben

texts.en:
Rauben is a old client aged 46 years old. He is a married man with five children. His major business is selling radios in the daily markets. He has been in business for ten years and while in this business he has educated his children. He came to UGAFODE for a loan to increase his stock and add television sets and radios which can earn him additional income.

He has a dream of putting up a permanent shop. He applied for a loan of UGX 1,000,000. He is hard-working and thanks UGAFODE for availing him of cheap financial services.

In the photo is the client and the UGAFODE credit officer.

loans.use: To buy radios.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soap, biscuits and drinks for resale.

loans.name: Alifunsi

texts.en:
Alfunsi is a repeat client who lives in a rural area in Nyarubaare Ntungamo district. His major activity is farming especially bee keeping and a banana plantation. 

He has applied for loan of UGX 2,000,000 to buy more bee hives and mulch for his plantation so that his business can yield more income. He will use this income to educate his children and improve standards of living for his family.

loans.use: To buy mulch and bee hives.

loans.name: Satik

texts.en:
Satik is from Masis town. She is a nurse and has been providing nursing services for already five years. Her office is in local clinic and she receives her clients there and provides high-quality medical help to them. By asking for this loan, Satik wants to improve her working conditions. With the help of the loan Satik plans to purchase equipment that she needs to provide a better service to her clients and also to renovate the office. The loan will greatly assist Satik to improve her working conditions and provide a better service to her clients.

Satik has been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF International. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products.

The loan is very important for Satik and she hopes for lenders' support.

loans.use: to pay for equipment needed to provide the nurse service and renovate the office.

loans.name: Mirian Del Rosario

texts.es: Mirian de 27 años de edad es madre soltera Y habita en condiciones muy humildes junto a su hijo de 6 años.  Mirian es promotora de salud dentro de su comunidad además, vende productos de belleza por catálogo. Es una mujer emprendedora quien es muy conocida por sus vecinos y dan buenas referencias de ella. Desea reparar el techo de la vivienda y paredes de su casa por lo que solicita este crédito a FUSAI para comprar lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento, arena y pago de mano de obra. Expresa tener la capacidad de pago que l crédito implica.
texts.en:
Mirian, 27, is a single mother. She lives with her six-year-old son in very humble conditions. Mirian works as a healthcare promoter in her community. She also sells beauty products from a catalog. Mirian is an enterprising woman, well-known among her neighbors, who give good references of her.

She wants to repair her roof and walls, and this is why she is requesting a loan at FUSAI. She will buy galvanized sheets, wood, cement, sand and will pay for labor. She says she will be able to pay the loan back.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheets, wood, cement and sand, and pay for labor to fix her roof and walls.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: La señora Loudes  tiene 20 años y tiene una hijita de dos añitos, la Señora Lourdes  se dedica a la  venta de comida, ,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución, la Señora Lourdes  utilizara  este préstamo para la compra de insumos como papa, aceite y chuño para la elaboración se sus riquísimos platillos,  la razón para solicitar este préstamo es la falta de dinero, para la compra de estos insumos que le hace mucha falta para su negocio, la Señora Lourdes    enfrenta retos en su negocio que son incrementar su clientela para así generar mayores ingresos y  va a utilizar los beneficios en comprar cosas para su hogar y así de esta manera mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, la Señora Lourdes  se siente feliz y agradecida con  la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Loudes is 20 years old and has a little 2 year old daughter. Lourdes works selling food. This loan is her first cycle in the institution.  Lourdes will use this loan to buy ingredients such as potatoes, oil and chuño (dried potatoes) to make her delicious dishes. The reason she is asking for this loan is a lack of money to buy these ingredients that she really needs for her business. Lourdes faces challenges in her business, such as increasing her customers to generate more income. She is going to use the profits to buy things for her home and thus improve her family's quality of life. Lourdes is happy and grateful to the institution for the support given.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her business. She will buy potatoes, chuño and hominy.

loans.name: Josepha

texts.en: Josepha is 24 years old. She sells various items and has been in the business of selling rice, salt and cooking oil. With the loan, she would like to buy more rice, salt and cooking oil for sale.  The profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: to buy more rice, salt and cooking oil for sale.

loans.name: Fatima Margarita

texts.es:
Fátima, se dispone a mejorar la mercadería que ofrece a sus clientes para estas épocas de fin de año comprará variedad de calzado, en diferentes estilos, colores y tallas, para seguir cubriendo las de mandas y mejor su liquidez.
Con la inversión anterior Fátima logro fortalecer el negocio y mejorar las ganancias, lo que le permitieron cancelar puntualmente sus cuotas y apoyar más a su esposo en los gastos familiares.
texts.en: Fátima is going to improve the merchandise that she offers her customers during the end of the year season. She will buy a variety of shoes in different styles, colors and sizes in order to cover the demand and improve her liquidity. With the previous investment, Fátima was able to fortify her business and improve her earnings. This allowed her to make her payments on time and help her husband more with the household expenses.

loans.use: to buy a variety of shoes.

loans.name: Franklin Isaac

texts.es:
Franklin, se decidió por otro crédito para comprar un soldador lo que le ayudara a fortalecer su taller electrónico automotriz, agilizara su trabajo y dará un mejor servicio a sus clientes.
El préstamo anterior le sirvió para fortalecer el negocio dándole el soporte necesario para incrementar sus ingresos, atraer a nuevos clientes, ha cancelado sus deudas.
texts.en:
Franklin decided on another loan to buy a soldering iron. This will help him to fortify his electrical automotive workshop. It will speed up his work and provide a better service to his customers.  

With the previous loan he was able to fortify the business, giving him the support he needed to increase her income, attract new customers. He has paid off his debts.

loans.use: to buy a soldering iron

loans.name: Maribel

texts.es:
Maribel, tiene una mayor demanda de sus productos como lo son la venta de tortillas y comidas, por lo que se decidió por crédito para comprar una vajilla de platos, ollas y cacerolas, para mejorar la presentación de los diferentes tipos de comidas que prepara.
Maribel tuvo como resultado del  préstamo anterior mejores ganancias, más clientes y sus ventas son mejores. Hasta la fecha tiene mayor un negocio más rentable, en su familia todos se encuentran bien dispuestos a brindarle su apoyo en el negocio.
texts.en:
Maribel has a greater demand for her product which is the sale of tortillas and prepared food. That is why she opted for a loan in order to buy a set of plates, pots and pans, in order to improve the presentation of the different types of food that she prepares. 

As a result of the previous loan Maribel improved her profits, has more customers and her sales are better. To date she has overall a more profitable business. Within her family everyone is willing to offer her their support in the business.

loans.use: to buy a set of plates, pots and pans

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more gari for resale.

loans.name: Sad 8 Group

texts.fr: Le GIE SAD 8  est un groupement mixte composé de femmes et hommes qui font les mêmes activités et habitent dans le même village. Leur président s'appelle DOUDOU. Il est marié et père de famille qui évolue dans la culture de maraichage. Il sollicite ce montant  pour acheter des semences et intrants pour cultiver ses périmètres agricoles. Il prend en charge les dépenses quotidiennes de sa famille et commence sa journée à 8h pour la terminer à 19h. Il a une expérience de plus de 10 ans. A l’avenir il voudrait avoir une moto pompe pour augmenter sa production et diversifier son activité ; de ce fait il augmentera ses revenus et épargner un peu d’argent.
texts.en: The Gie Sad 8 is a mixed group of men and women who do the same activities and live in the same village. Their president is Doudou. He is married and a father, and is a market gardener. He is requesting this money in order to buy seeds and agricultural inputs so that he can cultivate his farm lands. He takes care of his family's daily expenditures and starts his workday at 8 o'clock, ending it at 7 o'clock in the evening. He has over 10 years experience in this line of work. In the future, he would like to have a pump-assembly so that he can increase his production and diversify his business; this would increase his income and enable him to save some money.

loans.use: for seeds and agricultural inputs.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La socia Isabel se sigue dedicando al negocio de ganderia y picanteria,la socia vende los ganados en las diferentes ferias y la socia tiene una picanteria donde vende comidas tipicas como cuy al horno y rocoto relleno,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,el sueño de la socia es ampliar el negocio de picanteria.La socia solicita el credito para comprar cane,pollo y verduras para cocinar.

La socia está muy agradecida con KIVA por permitirle dar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Isabel, the borrower, is still working in the cattle industry and in her picantería [restaurant serving traditional food and beverages]. She sells the cattle at various markets and she has a picantería where she sells typical meals such as baked guinea pigs and stuffed hot red peppers. She works from 8:00AM until 7:00PM.

Her dream is to expand the picantería. She is asking for a loan to buy sugar cane, chicken and vegetables for cooking.

She is very grateful to Kiva for permitting her to offer a better quality of life to her family and she is committed to completing her loan payments.

loans.use: to buy sugar cane, chicken and vegetables for cooking

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es: Beatriz de 31 años de edad reside con su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos de 16 años, 13 años y 11 años de edad. Junto con su esposo mantienen la economía del  hogar y dan a sus hijos lo necesario. Beatriz trabaja como emplea en una empresa cercana a su localidad y de esa forma colabora con la economía de su familia. Beatriz desea terminar un cuarto que con mucho esfuerzo ha logrado construir pero por falta de presupuesto no logró terminar el techo y el piso del mismo. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de lámina galvanizada, madera, cemento, arena y grava para finalizar el cuarto que tanta falta le hace.
texts.en: Beatriz is 31 years old. She lives with her life's companion and their three children, aged 15, 13 and 11. Together with her husband she supports the household and they give their children what they need. Beatriz is an employee in a business close to where she lives and in this way she contributes to the family budget. Beatriz wants to finish a room that she has been able to build with a lot of effort, but she doesn't have the budget for the floor and the roof. Because of this, she is asking FUSAI for a loan to invest in buying galvanized sheeting, wood, cement, sand and gravel to finish the room that she needs so much.

loans.use: to buy galvanized sheeting, wood, cement, sand and gravel to build the roof and floor for a room.

loans.name: Honoria

texts.es: La señora Honoria tiene 38 años, casada con 2 hijos que tienen la edad de 14 y 10 años, ella tiene la actividad de elaboración y venta de comida en su puesto de venta que se encuentra en la  localidad de Sacaba, este préstamo es el primero  que tiene con la institución, la señora Honoria va a usar este préstamo para culminar la instalación de agua potable a su domicilio ya que esta solo con pozo y es mucho trabajo trasladar el agua así que hará una conexión para baños, ducha y cocina  y así de esta manera brindara mayor comodidad a su familia ya que por muchas razones la zona no cuenta con servicios básicos pero esto no impedirá que La señora Honoria tenga agua potable en su domicilio. Se siente muy feliz por esta oportunidad que le brindan de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Honoria is 38 years old. She is married and has 2 children, aged 14 and 10. She works making and selling food in her food stall in the community of Sacaba. This loan is the first one that she has had with the institution. Honoria is going to use this loan to finishing putting potable running water in her house, because she only has a well and it is a lot of work to bring the water. She will make connections for bathrooms, a shower and the kitchen. This way, she will make things more comfortable for her family. For a lot of reasons, the area doesn't have basic services, but this won't stop Honoria from having potable water in her house. She feels very happy with this opportunity that is being offered to improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to finish putting potable running water in her house.

loans.name: La Cooperativa Group

texts.es: El Banco de Emprendimiento LA COOPERATIVA está compuesto por diez integrantes de los cuales ocho  son mujeres y dos varones, que se dedican a distintas actividades, la presidenta del banco es  la señora Miriam, ella se dedica  a la venta de artículos de primera necesidad en su  tienda de barrio que se encuentran ubicado en su mismo domicilio que es en la zona de Primavera de la ciudad de La paz,  este préstamo es su primera secuencia dentro de la institución,  la señora Miriam va a usar este préstamo para a la compra de mercadería para surtir su negocio, su razón para solicitar este préstamo es necesidad de surtir su tienda ya que se acerca la época de Navidad y desea comprar también panetones, la señora Miriam enfrenta retos en su negocio que son la competencia ya que en la zona hay muchas tiendas de barrio, ella va a utilizar los beneficios para seguir comprando mercadería y así incrementar su capital y poder tener un almacén ya que este es uno deseos, se siente feliz y agradecida por esta oportunidad que le brindan a ella ya sus compañeras de grupo ya que en muchas casos sacan solas a su familia adelante.
texts.en: The LA COOPERATIVA communal bank is made up ten members, Eight of them are women and two are men. They work in different activities. The president of the bank is Miriam. She works selling staple items in her neighborhood store. It is located in her house, which is in the Primavera area of the city of La Paz. This loan is her first cycle in the institution. Miriam is going to use this loan to buy merchandise to stock her business. Her reason for asking for this loan is that she needs to stock her business, since Christmas time is coming. She wants to buy panettones, as well. Miriam faces challenges in her business, such as competition, because there are a lot of neighborhood stores. She is going to use the profits to keep buying merchandise and thus increase her capital and be able to have a larger store, which is one of the things she wants. She feels happy and grateful for this opportunity that is being offered to her and the other members of the group, since in many cases they are getting their families ahead alone.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, and panettones wholesale.

loans.name: Francis

texts.es:
La señora Francis es una persona muy trabajadora y responsable vive en  una comunidad al sur de Honduras junto a sus 2 hijos. Su negocio es una pulpería desde hace 2 años.
Doña Francis su negocio lo tiene ubicado en su casa de habitación y la visitan sus vecinos a diario.  Necesita el préstamo para la compra de más materia prima como ser: aceite, refresco, pan, café, jabón, azúcar, churros, condimentos, etc. 
Doña Francis espera que el préstamo le ayude mucho ya que no cuenta con los insumos necesarios para cubrir la demanda  de sus clientes, además de un aumento en las ventas y con esto ganar más ingresos que beneficien el estilo de vida de la familia.
Doña Francis espera aumentar su negocio y seguir apoyando a sus hijos en sus estudios para que tengan mayores oportunidades en la vida.



Choluteca, Honduras – Noviembre 2013
texts.en:
Francis is a hardworking and responsible person. She lives in a community located in Southern Honduras, together with two children. She has had a grocery store for two years.

Francis runs her store at home, where her customers visit her every day. She needs this loan to buy supplies, such as cooking oil, beverages, bread, coffee, soap, sugar, churros and spices. She believes this loan will help her a lot, since she does not have enough supplies to fulfill her customers’ demands. Besides, increased sales would result in an increased income and an improvement of her family’s quality of life.

Francis hopes to expand her business and continue supporting her children with their studies, so that they can have better opportunities in their lives.

Choluteca, Honduras – November 2013

loans.use: to buy supplies for her store: cooking oil, beverages, bread, coffee, soap, sugar, churros, spices, etc.

loans.name: Hilda

texts.es:
La socia Hilda continua dedicándose al negocio de venta de comida, la socia lleva buen tiempo dedicándose a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone caída a su negocio, la socia vende diferentes tipos de platos como arroz con pollo, sopas entre otros, la socia vende a sus clientes que le solicitan, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo  de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.
La socia solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos como aceite, arroz entre otros.
La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Hilda, the borrower, is still working in the food business. She has spent a long time dedicating herself to this business which is going well thanks to the effort she puts into the business. She sells different types of dishes such as chicken with rice, soups, and more, selling what the customers ask for. She is a responsible and persevering person who supports her family. She is asking for a loan to buy supplies such as oil, rice, and more. She is grateful for the granted loan and she promises to meet her payments as established.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as oil, rice, and more.

loans.name: Eulofio

texts.es:
Don Eulofio es una persona honesta y trabajadora  el vive en una comunidad hacia el sur de Honduras junto con el viven su esposa y sus 3 hijos. Su negocio compra y destazo de ganado desde hace 15 años.
Don Eulofio tiene su negocio en casa y también sale a vender su a su comunidad y en los caseríos cercanos la misma. El necesita el  préstamo para la compra de vacas.
Don Eulofio espera que el préstamo le sirva de mucho ya que gracias a el contara con el producto suficiente para cubrir los pedidos y demandas de su clientes y así satisfacer las necesidades de los mismos. Espera que sus ventas aumenten y de esta manera ganar más ingresos que vengan a beneficiar un poco su estilo de vida de la familia. 
Don Eulofio espera aumentar su negocio y seguir apoyando a sus hijos en sus estudios y que así de esta manera puedan cumplir los sueños y  que  así tengan mayores oportunidades en el futuro.


Choluteca, Honduras – Noviembre 2013
texts.en:
Eulofio is an honest and hardworking person. He lives in a community located in Southern Honduras, together with his wife and three children. He has been working buying and selling cattle for fifteen years.

Eulofio works at home, but also sells around his community and in nearby villages. He needs a loan to buy cows. He believes this loan will help him a lot, since he will now have enough animals to fulfill his customers’ orders and demands. He hopes that his sales increase in order to receive a higher income and be able to improve his family’s quality of life.

Eulofio would like to expand his business and continue supporting his children’s education so that they can follow their dreams and have better opportunities in the future.

Choluteca, Honduras – November 2013

loans.use: to buy cows for his business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more soap, paste, biscuits and drinks for resale.

loans.name: Daphrose

texts.en:
Daphrose is 61 years old. She is married with eight children.

To earn a living, for the past six years, she has been selling bananas.

She is now seeking this loan to buy more bananas for re-sale. With the profits she expects from the business as a result of the loan, she would like to buy a plot of land where she could rear cattle in the future.

loans.use: To purchase additional bananas for sale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish, rice, palm oil and cooking seasoning to expand her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fish for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional drinks (pure water, beer, etc.) for re-sale.

loans.name: Aura Maria

texts.es:
Ella es aura, estudia mercadeo y ventas pasa a tercer semestre, ella nos cuenta y demuestra con gran entusiasmo hacia le próximo semestre, con el anhelo de descubrir que otras cosas nuevas aprenderá.
El mercadeo consiste en actividades de individuos como organizaciones, de esta forma se hacen interrelaciones entre productores, consumidores, el mercadeo es el proceso de planeaiòn y ejecución de conceptos, precios, promociones, es una carrera que consiste en estrategias y en conocer bien al cliente. 
Lo que la apasiono para elegir esta carrera es la singular manera de ver las cosas, aura puede darnos la idea de lo que le gusta acerca del tema.
describió lo que siente al al ejercer trabajo de campo y al presentar los frutos del anterior semestre en campo alto. 
Como se puede notar a ella le gusta demasiado su carrera, por eso no la quiere dejar a mitad de camino y cree que con la ayuda de kiva, ella podrá terminar sus estudios para poder tener mas experiencia en la carrera que escogió.
texts.en:
This is Aura - she is starting the third semester of her studies in marketing and sales. Aura tells us - and shows us - her great enthusiasm for her next semester as she has a strong desire to discover the new things that she will learn.

Marketing classes consist of individual activities on organisations, how interrelations between producers and consumers is formed. Marketing is about planning and executing ideas, prices and promotions. Classes are about knowing what strategies are and in knowing the customer well.

What made Aura choose this study programme is that it provides a very singular way of looking at things. Aura explained that she likes her subject. She described how it feels doing field work and showed us the fruits of her effort last semester at Campo Alto.

As you can tell, Aura really likes her studies but she does not want to leave them after completing just half. She thinks that, with the help of Kiva, she will be able to finish her studies and gain more experience in the subject area that she has chosen.

loans.use: to pay for one semester of tuition fees.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en: Anahit is from Gandzaqar village in the Tavush region of Armenia. She lives with her husband and three school-age children – a daughter and two sons. Anahit works as a cleaner.
