La señora  Yohanna  es una persona responsable, trabajadora y honesta, vive   con su esposo y sus 3 hijas  en el  sur de Honduras. Su negocio es  la  pulpería desde hace más de 2 años. 
Doña Yohanna el préstamo lo necesita para la compra de  manteca,  arroz,  frijoles, pollo, refrescos, etc. Con el préstamo espera que las ventas en su negocio aumenten al tener más producto que ofrecer y atender mejor  a sus clientes. 
Doña  Yohanna  espera cubrir las necesidades  que tiene y mejorar un poco su calidad  de vida y la de su familia. En unos años espera que su negocio siga  creciendo  y se convierta en uno de  los  negocios más grande y reconocido de la zona y  seguir  apoyando que sus  hijos   para que  sean personas  de bien para la  sociedad. 	




Choluteca, Honduras  –  Noviembre   del   2013
texts.en:
Sra. Yohanna is a responsible, hardworking, honest person who lives with her husband and three children in the south of Honduras. She has run a grocery store for more than two years. Now she needs a loan to buy butter, rice, beans, chicken, soft drinks etc. As a result she expects her income to rise as she will have more merchandise and better service to offer her customers.

Yohanna hopes to pay for daily necessities and gradually improve the standard of living of herself and her family. In the next few years she expects her business to continue to grow and become one of the biggest and most well-known in the area. She wants to continue supporting her children so they become upstanding members of society.

loans.use: buy butter, rice, beans, chicken, soft drinks etc for her grocery store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for drinks and confectionaries

loans.name: Rugiatu

texts.en:
This is 51-year-old Rugiatu. She is married and has three children aged eight, fourteen and eighteen. In 1998, Rugiatu established her plastic products business. She started the business after dropping out of school to be self-reliant. Her business is located in the city center and her main customers are adults. Working seven days a week and 12 hours a day, she earns about SLL 2,993,390 every month from this business. 

Rugiatu would like a loan in the amount of SLL 5,000,000. Rugiatu has already received and successfully repaid one loan, and now requires a new loan in order to buy plastic shoes and chairs. She hopes that this loan can improve her stock and raise more profit. In the future, Rugiatu plans to expand the business to the outskirts of town. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to pay for plastic shoes and chairs

loans.name: Karimjon

texts.ru:
Каримджон  живет в селе неподалеку от города Канибадама.  Ему  57 лет. Он женат и имеет троих детей. Каримджон работает в насосной станции вагоноремонтного завода.  Одной зарплаты для содержания семьи не хватает и для того , чтобы содержать семью, оплачивать обучение детей помогать престарелым родителям  ему необходимо дополнительно заниматься  скотоводством.  А также дополнительным источником его дохода является садоводство.   Его жена и двое сыновей уехали на заработки для того , чтобы поддерживать благосостояние  растущей семьи и  позаботиться о будущем.
Каримчон в начале этого года  начал строить дом но не смог достроить его,так как у него на тот момент не хватала денежных средств. Теперь до приезда сыновей он хочет достроить дом и для этого он обратился в Арванд за кредитом.
На полученный кредит Каримчон хочет купить строительные материалы и осуществить свои планы. Он заранее благодарит Арванд за финансовую поддержку.
texts.en:
Karimjon lives in a village not far from the town of Kanibadama. He is 57 years old. He is married and has three children. Karimjon works in a filling station wagon repair factory. One salary to support a family is not enough, and therefore to support the family, to pay for the children's education, and to help his elderly parents it is necessary for him also to raise livestock. And an additional source of income comes from gardening. His wife and two sons went abroad in order to support the well-being of a growing family and to care for the future.

Earlier this year, Karimjon began to build a home but was not able to finish it since he does not have at the moment enough monetary resources. Now before the arrival of his sons, he wants to build a home and for this he applied to Arvand for a loan.

With the loan received, Karimjon wants to buy construction materials and to implement his plans. He thanks Arvand in advance for the financial support.

loans.use: to buy building materials

loans.name: La Guardiania Group

texts.en:
The eight women of this group are from San Antonio Suchitepéquez, near the city of Mazatenango, Suchitepéquez, Guatemala.  Most of their businesses are in food, medicine or catalog sales.  They are all eager to start this nine-month cycle with Namaste, as they are looking forward to learning how to manage their businesses and also to having a business advisor help them write a business plan and implement it.

Juana (fourth from left) is 44 years old and single with four children.  She never had the opportunity to go to school as her family was too poor.  Two of her children are in school and two are already working.  She has had much adversity in her life including a major illness in recent years.  Despite this, she never lost hope and managed to pay off her debts and get cured from her illness with the help of natural medicine.  

Her business is selling Omnilife products as she is convinced of their success through her experience curing her own illness.  She also sells chickens, ducks and turkeys.  She will be spending her loan money on more Omnilife products to meet the demand of her clients.  Her profits at the beginning of the loan cycle are about 1,965 Guatemalan Quetzales (around $248 USD), and she is aiming for a 15% increase in profits to earn at least 2,259 Guatemalan Quetzales ($286 USD).  Her dream is to improve life for herself and her children, and especially to have a better house as her current home is made of simple materials and during the rainy season water comes in.

loans.use: to buy more natural medicine to help her clients.

loans.name: Sokheng

texts.en:
Sokheng is 21 years old. He is married and resides with his father in Kampong Speu Province, Cambodia. He has a two year-old child. To earn a living, Sokheng works in garment factory. He earns about $5 daily. His wife sells pure drinking water, incense sticks and flowers. She makes an income of $3 per day. 

In addition, this couple is involved in cultivating rice. To improve their farming process, Sokheng is requesting a loan of $1,000 to purchase cattle to use for plowing the farmland. This purchase will help reduce their farming expense. In the future, he would like to take another loan from KREDIT to fix their house.

loans.use: to purchase cattle to use for plowing her farmland

loans.name: Pablo

texts.en:
Pablo is married with an only child; he operates a motor transportation business in their community to earn a living. 

Aside from being a farmer, he has been providing transportation services for four years, earning well for the family. 

He borrowed a loan from GDMPC micro credit to cover the costs of motor maintenance. 

He is hopeful to see his family have a better living in the future.

loans.use: to cover the costs of motorcycle maintenance

loans.name: Sherali

texts.ru: Шерали 32 года. Он проживает в районе Дж.Руми и занимается там растениеводством. Шерали сейчас собирается начать еще один бизнес. Его интересует овцеводство, так как это прибыльный бизнес и не требует тяжелого труда. Шерали уже запасся 200 вязком кукурузной травы, 100 вязком люцерны, к тому же у него при дворе дома имеется сарай, который он будет использовать для содержания скота. То есть он уже создал все условия для бизнеса, осталось лишь закупить сам скот. Для этой цели Шерали запрашивает кредит. Он собирается купить двух овец и откармливать их в течение 30-35 дней, а после продать с наценкой на том же скотном рынке, где он приобретет их. Шерали дальновидный человек. Как только он добьется успеха в новом бизнесе, он увеличит поголовье скота и расширит бизнес.
texts.en:
Sherali is 32 years old. He resides in the J.Rumy region and is involved there in growing crops. Sherali now intends to start another business. He is interested in sheepherding, since this is a lucrative business and does not require heavy work.

Sherali has already stocked 200 bundles of corn grass, 100 bundles of alfalfa, and beside his home in the courtyard he has a barn that he will use to care for the livestock. That is, he already has created all the conditions for the business, and it remains only to buy himself some livestock.

With this aim, Sherali is requesting a loan. He intends to buy two sheep and to fatten them over the course of 30-35 days, and after to sell at a premium at the same livestock market where he acquires them. Sherali is a farsighted person. Once he succeeds in the new business, her will increase the livestock count and expand the business.

loans.use: to buy two sheep to start a business

loans.name: Orlanda

texts.es:
Orlanda, a sus 59 años de edad, es madre soltera de 3 hijos a los que sacó adelante con gran esfuerzo, trabajando largas jornadas para conseguir el sustento diario y educar a sus hijos.
Desde que era joven aprendió el oficio de la confección, gracias a las enseñanzas de su madre y, gracias a ello, hoy en día se gana la vida trabajando en su pequeño taller donde ofrece el servicio de arreglo de prendas, confección de artículos para el hogar como sábanas, acolchados, cojines, manteles, cortinas, entre otros y adicionalmente elabora algunos lotes pequeños de blusas que un tercero le solicita; de esta manera genera los recursos suficientes para solventar sus gastos personales y del hogar.
Con el ánimo de continuar con su labor, solicita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de materia prima al por mayor (telas, hilos, botones, entre otros), esto le permitirá trabajar de manera más holgada y podrá cumplir con los pedidos y encargos a sus clientes, dando paso a un incremento en las ventas y por ende, en los ingresos que percibe por su labor.
Orlanda manifiesta que su edad no le impide seguir soñando, y por ello sigue luchando para llegar a cumplir el deseo de tener un taller mucho más grande y bien estructurado, con máquinas industriales y que le permita generar empleo y mejorar la rentabilidad, para tener la capacidad de mejorar sus condiciones de vida y disfrutar una vejez sin ninguna preocupación monetaria.
texts.en:
Orlanda is a 59 year old, single mother of three who works hard to get her children ahead in life.  When she was young, she learned the tailoring trade thanks to her mother.  Today, she earns a living working in a small workshop where she provides garment mending services, and tailors sheets, quilts, pillows, tablecloths, curtains, and other household items.  In addition, she makes small lots of blouses ordered by a third party.  In this way, she generates enough money to pay for personal and household expenses.

With the intention of continuing her work, she is requesting the loan to purchase wholesale fabric, thread, buttons, and other basic materials.  This will allow her to work more comfortably and enable her to fulfill her customers’ orders and requests, leading to an increase in sales and, therefore, income she receives for her work. 

Orlanda says that her age won’t stop her from continuing to dream, and for this reason, she continues striving to fulfill her desire to have a much larger workshop that is well structured, with industrial sewing machines.  This will allow her to generate jobs, improve profitability, and have the ability to improve her living conditions and enjoy old age without worrying about money.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale fabric, thread, buttons, and other basic materials.

loans.name: Julio  Cesar

texts.es: Julio cesar es originario de la ciudad de Boaco, soltero. De 26 años de edad. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de artículos variados de uso personal. Inicio su negocio hace varios años con dinero prestado y así logro salir adelante. Su meta próxima es vender sus productos en diferentes lugares de la ciudad. Solicita el crédito para comprar: Reloj, Mosquiteros, carteras, fajas, Hamacas entre otros productos. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda ya que podrá incrementar la venta de sus productos y ofrecer una mayor variedad así como aumentar sus ganancias y así mejorar la infraestructura de su casa. Su plan futuro es obtener más créditos para que su negocio crezca cada día más.
texts.en:
Julio Cesar is a native of the city of Boaco. He is single and 26 years old. He is a merchant and sells a variety of personal use items. He started his business several years ago with borrowed money and became successful. His next goal is to sell his products in different areas of the city. 

He is requesting a loan to purchase watches, mosquito nets, handbags, belts and hammocks, among other items. He estimates that the loan will be a big help and lead to an increase in sales because he will provide a larger and more varied inventory. Thus he will increase his profits and be able to improve the infrastructure of his house. His future plan is to obtain more loans so that his business can continue to grow every day.

loans.use: to purchase watches, mosquito nets, handbags, belts and hammocks among other items.

loans.name: Analie

texts.en:
Analie works hard to support her family. Analie is married, and has a general store business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years now.

Analie requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to purchase more stock to sell in her general store.

She would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more stock to sell in her general store

loans.name: Mónica Esther

texts.es: Mónica de 46 años de edad, es madre de un niño de 4 años,  con el que habita al sur de la ciudad. Allí en su domicilio, desde hace 13 años, tiene su taller de confecciones en las líneas femenina, masculina e infantil, pues ella desde muy niña, a la edad de 14 años empezó a trabajar en una confección, en las tareas de oficios varios y allí aprendió la actividad, dirigida por la propietaria del negocio, quien la veía inspirada y con mucho potencial para el oficio der la costura. Poco a poco aprendió de ella y posteriormente, se capacitó durante 3 años en una academia, para lograr un aprendizaje con mayor estándar, conociendo las técnicas de la confección, hasta que debió trabajar desde su casa, para cuidar a su padre enfermo, con lo esta situación se independizó y empezó su propia aventura emprendedora; hoy elabora blusas, pantalones, bermudas, trabajando en su propia casa, lugar donde llegan a buscarla sus clientes, para obtener el servicio. Cada día la exigencia para competir en el mercado de la confección, es mayor y aunque Mónica aplica muy bien las diversas técnicas de las operaciones de costura, no ha logrado confeccionarle a terceros, que es la modalidad más productiva de la actualidad, porque su infraestructura no lo permite. Esta es la razón, por la cual acude a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, mediante el cual comprará una máquina plana, una fileteadora industrial y una recubridora, para responder a nuevas alternativas que el mercado le ha propuesto.
texts.en:
Monica is 46 years old and the mother of a four-year-old child. She lives with her son in the south of the city. She has had a sewing workshop in her home for 13 years, where she sews women's, men's and children's clothing. She was very young, 14 years old, when she began to work at a workshop, completing a variety of different tasks. This is where she learned this activity, guided by the owner of the business, who saw that Monica was inspired and had a lot of potential as a seamstress. Little by little, Monica learned from her. After that, Monica trained for three years at an academy to develop better skills. She learned sewing techniques until she had to begin to work from home in order to care for her ill father.

Given this situation, she became independent and began her own entrepreneurial adventure. Today she makes blouses, pants, and bermuda shorts, all from her own home. That's where her customers come to buy things and use her sewing services.

Every day it takes more and more in order to compete in the sewing business, and although Monica has mastered the diverse techniques involved sewing, she hasn't managed to break into the wholesale market because of a lack of infrastructure. Being a wholesale provider is currently the most profitable way of making a living in this field. This is the reason why Monica is currently requesting a Kiva loan. This will be her first funding from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. She will use it to purchase a sewing machine, an industrial serger, and a cover-stitch machine. This will let her respond to the new alternatives that the market now offers.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, an industrial serger and a cover-stitch machine.

loans.name: Janner Stiven

texts.es:
Janner  stiven nació el 20 de junio, se graduó como bachiller académico con profundización en educación en la escuela normal superior  maría auxiliadora de Guadalupe Santander.
Llego recientemente a Bogotá con la ambición de seguir en su formación académica, después de observar los programas y técnicas diferentes de los centros educativos opto por vincularse a la institución de educación superior las mercedes como técnico profesional en arte gráfico y publicitario.
La gran vocación de servicio que ha adquirido, porque el padre fue un servidor público de la policía nacional, lo ambiciona a prepararse de manera entusiasta para ser un líder y trabajar por las personas más desprotegidas de Colombia e intentar ser un gran oficial de policía nacional, cuando termine la carrera técnica profesional en este centro educativo.
Como él no tiene la capacidad económica suficiente para lograr este objetivo, cuenta con el apoyo que kiva le pueda hacer para cumplir el primero de los logros que es terminar este técnico,  el propósito a demás de estudiar con gran empeño, es conseguir un trabajo en el tiempo disponible para ayudar con el compromiso de formación, para el crecimiento personal e integral y a si también ayudar a la familia, especialmente a los padres.
texts.en:
Janner Stiven was born on June the 20th. He graduated from the teaching school María Auxiliadora de Guadalupe Santander.  He recently arrived to Bogotá with the ambition of continuing his studies and after observing the different programs and techniques in the educational centers, he decided to attend to the institution of higher education Las Mercedes to study graphic art and advertising. 

The fact that his father was a police officer gave him a great dedication to the service, and such dedication inspires him to become an enthusiastic leader and to work for the most unprotected people in Colombia. He also wishes to become a great police officer once he finishes his professional studies in his current educational institution.

Because he doesn’t have the financial capacity to obtain such goals, he relies on Kiva’s support to fulfill the first of his goals, which is to finish his current studies. Another objective that he has besides studying with great determination is to get a job during his free time so he can support his commitment towards formation, increase his personal growth and support his family, especially his parents.

loans.use: to pay his tuition fee.

loans.name: Mausauri

texts.es: Mausauri  continua con la venta de útiles de escritorio por lo tanto en esta oportunidad requiere el préstamo para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo cuadernos, lapiceros, papeles y otras cosas más, él agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio pues valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad. Él pertenece al banco Comunal “San Martincito” de la Asociación Arariwa de la ciudad de Paucartambo.
texts.en: Mausauri continues to sell stationary items and he needs a loan to buy merchandise such as notebooks, mechanical pencils, paper, and other things.  He is grateful to those who form part of this dream, values the loan, and is committed to making his monthly payments responsibly.  He is a member of the “San Martincito” communal bank of the Arariwa association in Paucartambo.

loans.use: to stock his store.

loans.name: Bibimuslima

texts.ru: Бибимуслима молодая замужняя женщина, ей 21 год. Она живет в селе города Вахдат. Бибимуслима талантливая и способная. Она умеет шить женские национальные платья разных фасонов. У нее есть старая швейная машинка, с помощью которой она шьет себе эти платья. Сейчас она решила начать швейное дело и таким образом зарабатывать. Для покупки компьютерной швейной машинки и тканей для шитья она просит кредит, так как ее собственного сбережения не хватает. Бибимуслима будет заниматься этим делом у себя дома. Ей будут помогать ее сноха и тетя мужа. Она с надеждой ждет поддержки, ведь начав этот бизнес, у нее появится источник дохода.
texts.en:
Bibimuslima is a young, married woman, age 21. She lives in a village near the city of Vahdat. Bibimuslima is talented and capable. She knows how to sew women's national dresses of various fashions. She has an old sewing machine, with the help of which she sews herself these dresses.

Now, she has decided to start a sewing business and in this way to earn a living. To buy a computerized sewing machine and fabrics for sewing, she is requesting a loan, since her own savings are not enough. Bibimuslima will engage in this work at her home. She will be assisted by her daughter-in-law and her husband's aunt. She waits with hope for the support, since starting this business will bring a source of income.

loans.use: to purchase a computerized sewing machine and fabrics for sewing

loans.name: Dekeisha

texts.en:
Trinidad and Tobago resident Dekeisha has a job that most would not find too creative: She has been a Senior Legal Assistant in New York City for almost ten years. However, she has always had a creative and unusual sense of style, and when she woke up one day and realized that it was time to start working towards her dream of becoming her own boss, she relied on her knack for creative design.

In 2012, Dekeisha established OseiLei, a kitchenware and home goods company that features products that have a more creative, unique, and unconventional design than traditional cookware items. 
 
“I have eccentric taste, and I felt that many people, including myself, were lacking cool, never-seen-before, and affordable household gadgets. Therefore, I decided it was time to create something durable, affordable, and chic for consumers to use in their kitchens.”

For Dekeisha, who is married and has a daughter, her highest priority is to have a happy and healthy family, and having a profitable, successful business is one way to ensure that. With this loan, Dekeisha will build prototypes for her kitchenware designs. With these prototypes, she will be able to showcase her creations at tradeshows and attract investors and market her products for future manufacturing. 

Dekeisha hopes that her story will inspire others to live their dreams by showing them that with hard work and determination, anything is possible. 

Help her support her family and move closer to her dream.

loans.use: to build a prototype for her kitchenware designs.

loans.name: Muhabbat

texts.ru:
Мухаббат женщина среднего возраста. Родилась и выросла в городе Исфаре. Вышла замуж в юном возрасте. Но они с мужем жили не долго так как  не сошлись с характерами и после рождения ребенка они решили разойтись. Она устала от бесконечных ссор. Мухаббат ушла от него, и начала самостоятельную жизнь. По началу ей было очень трудно, с малышом на руке. Но после она нашла себе работу. Сейчас она занимается купле продажей сухофруктов, в местных рынках. А по ночам шьет национальные платья.
После того как купила новую квартиру,Мухаббат   отремонтировала ее, и теперь к наступлению зимы  она хочет  установить пластиковые окна и двери. Мухаббат решила  обратиться  в организацию Арванд за материальной помощью,так как ей не хватает денежных средств. На полученный кредит Мухаббат хочет купить окна и двери и установить у себя дома.  Она заранее благодарит Арванд за помощь и поддержку.
texts.en:
Muhabbat is a woman of middle age. She was born and raised in the town of Isfara. She got married at an early age. But she and her husband did not live together for long since their characters did not agree and after the birth of their child they decided to separate. She was tired of the endless quarrels. Muhabbat left him, and began life on her own. At the beginning, it was very hard for her with a little one to care for. But later she found herself work. Now, she buys and sells dried fruits in the local markets. And at night she sews national dresses.

After she bought a new apartment, Muhabbat renovated it and now with the approaching winter she wants to put up plastic doors and windows. Muhabbat decided to turn to the organization Arvand for material support, since she did not have sufficient funds. With the loan received, Muhabbat wants to buy windows and doors and to install them in her home. She thanks Arvand in advance for the help and support.

loans.use: to buy plastic windows and doors

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en:
Angelina is 48 years old.  She has a live-in partner and seven children, three of whom attend school.  She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Angelina has a fish vending business in the Philippines.  Angelina has requested a loan of 13,000 PHP through NWTF in order to buy more fish to sell to her customers.  Angelina has been in this business for five years. 

In the future, Angelina would like to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more fish to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Rhoda

texts.en: Rhoda helps her husband in running their own rice farm for a living. She has been doing this for twenty years, and she earns well for the family needs. She sells a portion of their farm produce in the market to earn money for the school needs of her children. Rhoda borrowed a new loan from GDMPC micro credit to purchase fertilizer in order to improve the farm. She hopes to have a greener farm, and to be able to gain more returns in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer.
